com.constantcontact
Class ConstantContact

java.lang.Object
  com.constantcontact.ConstantContact

public class ConstantContact
extends java.lang.Object

Main Constant Contact class.
This is meant to be used by users to access Constant Contact API functionality.

  • ContactService
  • ContactListService
  • EmailCampaignService
  • AccountService
  • EmailCampaignScheduleService
  • EmailCampaignTrackingService
  • ContactTrackingService
  • BulkActivitiesService

getContacts

public ResultSet<Contact> getContacts(java.lang.Integer limit,
                                      java.lang.String modifiedSinceTimestamp,
                                      Contact.Status status)
                               throws ConstantContactServiceException
Get contacts API.
Details in : ContactService#getContacts(String, Integer, String)

Parameters:
limit - The maximum number of results to return - can be null.
modifiedSinceTimestamp - This time stamp is an ISO-8601 ordinal date supporting offset.
It will return only the contacts modified since the supplied date.
If you want to bypass this filter set modifiedSinceTimestamp to null.
status - Return only records with the given status. Does not support VISITOR or NON_SUBSCRIBER
Returns:
The contacts.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - Thrown when :
  • something went wrong either on the client side;
  • or an error message was received from the server side.

To check if a detailed error message is present, call ConstantContactException.hasErrorInfo()
Detailed error message (if present) can be seen by calling ConstantContactException.getErrorInfo()

  • something went wrong either on the client side;
  • or an error message was received from the server side.

getBillingChangeNotification

public BillingChangeNotification getBillingChangeNotification(java.lang.String xCtctHmacSHA256,
                                                              java.lang.String bodyMessage)
                                                       throws ConstantContactException,
                                                              java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Get Billing Change Notification.

Parameters:
xCtctHmacSHA256 - The value in the x-ctct-hmac-sha256 header.
bodyMessage - The body message from the POST received from ConstantContact in Webhook callback.
Returns:
The BillingChangeNotification object corresponding to bodyMessage in case of success; an exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Thrown when the encryption algorithm used for validation is not available. Should not happen.
ConstantContactException - Thrown when :
  • message encryption does not correspond with x-ctct-hmac-sha256 header value;
  • or an error is raised when parsing the bodyMessage.
Error message is taken from one of the members of Config.Errors

isValidWebhook

public boolean isValidWebhook(java.lang.String xCtctHmacSHA256,
                              java.lang.String bodyMessage)
                       throws ConstantContactException,
                              java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Validates a Webhook message.

Parameters:
xCtctHmacSHA256 - The value in the x-ctct-hmac-sha256 header.
bodyMessage - The body message from the POST received from ConstantContact in Webhook callback.
Returns:
true if in case of success; false if the Webhook is invalid.
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Thrown when the encryption algorithm used for validation is not available. Should not happen.
ConstantContactException - Thrown when: message encryption does not correspond with x-ctct-hmac-sha256 header value.
Error message is taken from one of the members of Config.Errors
